alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Weber... south central Box Elder...western Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 555 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 19 miles north of Utah Test and Training Range North to near Delle to 13 miles west of Dugway English Village. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Skull Valley, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Utah Test and Training Range North, Rush Valley, Hat Island, Lakeside and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 58 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys
